Topic: Draw a fish in their habitat with labels.
Evidence Statements: The student can draw a fish in its natural water habitat, like a river, lake, or ocean.
The student can label the fish and its habitat components, such as water, plants, and other animals around it.
The student can include and label resources the fish needs, like water and food.
The student can show and label where the fish finds these resources in its habitat.
The student can demonstrate how the fish and its habitat work as a system, with the fish using the resources around it to meet its needs.
